title: Happy Valentine's Day - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description:
I thought this site summed up the Internet's general feeling towards Valentine's Day. I'm not particularly against the day - it's always nice to go out to a fancy restaurant in a nice suit. I just wish it weren't so crowded or hard to get reservations...
...
content: Happy Valentine's Day Moz News By: Rand Fishkin February 14, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin February 14, 2006 Happy Valentine's Day Moz News The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I thought this site summed up the Internet's general feeling towards Valentine's Day. I'm not particularly against the day - it's always nice to go out to a fancy restaurant in a nice suit. I just wish it weren't so crowded or hard to get reservations... Brilliant, no? Too bad the site isn't working right now (apparently it's "due to too many synchronous requests" - hopefully they'll have it fixed soon. Copied! Back to Top
